description: This restaurant at the entrance to the historic centre boasts a delightful garden which leads to a porch where tables are set out in summer – an enchanting setting that feels as though you’re eating in the countryside despite the village location. The chefs’ imagination knows no bounds in complex and elaborate dishes that focus on ingredients from Puglia and are grouped into themed tasting menus.
